column5: Always enjoyed Bill.Always funny. Real life comedy.    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4K5YBNQq-Qo
The best comedian ever.Happy 73 bday Sir bill cosby. I  can relate totally

Wow that one brings back childhood memories. I must have watched that HBO special (himself) like 100 times.  Well it was probably more like my mom and dad watched it 100 times , but i always found myself sitting in with them to watch.  I think that comedy special sprung the Cosby Show not long after (may be wrong)  Good clean stand up..........not that i dont enjoy a dirty comic lol.......but not much out there these days that id feel comfortable sitting down with my niece and nephew watching.
Absolutely one of the classiest comedians ever !
